meanings.definition: A type of antifungal medication used to treat fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed miconazoles to cure the fungal infection on my skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought miconazoles from the pharmacy to treat her toenail fungus.
meanings.sent3: The miconazoles danced on the fungus, making it disappear like magic.
meanings.sent4: The miconazoles acted like tiny warriors fighting against the invading fungus.
meanings.sent5: As soon as I applied the miconazoles, I could feel them working to heal the infection.

meanings.definition: The plural form of miconazole, a medication used to treat fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: The nurse handed out packets of miconazoles to the patients in the ward.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on miconazoles to get rid of their fungal issues.
meanings.sent3: The miconazoles in the bottle whispered to each other about their healing powers.
meanings.sent4: The miconazoles on the shelf stood together, ready to fight any fungal intruders.
meanings.sent5: I always keep a supply of miconazoles in my medicine cabinet for emergencies.
